title: stellarhood main sale
blurb: Join the #StellarSociety and discover real existing solar systems! Only the FIRST discoverers of a solar system will be named on the interactive http://map.stellarhood.com!

title: CardanoSpace
blurb: The CardanoSpace sale works different than what you're used to. Rather than queuing up at a given point in time and praying to the server gods, you pre-register with your email!
